冺字的基本解释

冺
mǐn

冺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mǐn］
［《廣韻》武盡切，上軫，明。］
［《廣韻》彌鄰切，平真，明。］
亦作“冺1”。
(1)消灭；消失；消除。
(2)昏乱；淆乱。参见“泯亂”。
(3)混合；混淆。
(4)指合拢。用同“抿”。
(5)死的婉称。
[②]［miǎn］
亦作“冺2”。
目不明貌。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［mǐn］
["Guang Yun" Wu Jin cut, Shang Zhen, Ming. ]
["Guangyun" is close to neighbors, plain and clear. ]
Also known as "冺1".
(1) Eliminate; disappear; eliminate.
(2) Confusion; confusion. See "Chaos".
(3) Mixed; confused.
(4) Refers to closing. Use the same as "sip".
(5) The euphemism of death.

Unclear appearance.
